Who Am I

Briefly:

I'm a 17 year old teenager from Tampere. I'm a student and I love studying everything related to tech (view My History). I'm a member of the student council in the Classical High School of Tampere. I'm also a member of the Nuori kemia -panel which is a panel ran by the chemical industry of Finland. I'm also a volunteer for the Finnish Foundation for Share Promotion.

My studies:

I'm currently a student in the Classical High School of Tampere (2019-2022). I also study in many open university courses, some of the ongoing ones can be viewed below. My completed courses can be viewed in My History

Software development skills: Front-end

In the course you develop responsive webpage using html, CSS and a little JavaScript, and maybe additionally Bootstrap or animations. These are the basic tools to make todayâ€™s web-frontend. The project focuses only on the layout, styles and the overall structure of the page.

Software development skills: Back-end

In the course you develop a RESTful back-end using NodeJS, ExpressJS, and MongoDB. These are the basic tools to make backends for JavaScript-based websites. The project focuses only on the layout, styles and the overall structure of the page.

Software development skills: Full-stack

During the course you develop a full stack program that includes a JavaScript backend, and a responsive webpage using html, CSS and a little JavaScript, and maybe additionally Bootstrap or animations. These are the basic tools to make a contemporary full web application.
